resources.string: Long press on fingerprint sensor to unlock phone when screen is off
Make keyboard apps haptic feedback independent of touch feedback switch
Simulate effect of pressing on a mechanical keyboard when typing
This will invalidate vibration strength settings from keyboard apps
Disable vibration to save power when Battery Saver is on
No installed apps support current settings
Configure refresh rate individually for each apps
Use 60 Hz screen refresh rate to save power when Battery Saver is on
Force highest refresh rate for all apps
This will ensure system select highest refresh rate, ignoring user selected and app preferred options. Apps that require specific refresh rate may run abnormally.

This will ensure system select highest refresh rate, ignoring user selected and app preferred options. Apps that require specific refresh rate may run abnormally.\n\nScreen refresh rate will still fallback to 60hz if video enhancement is running.
Turn off media volume when the alert slider is set to silent
Mute action will only take effect when using speaker as media output device
Mute action will take effect for all media output devices
After bluetooth devices connected, device will switch to vibrate mode if in ringer mode
Reduces eye strain in low light conditions by minimizing screen flicker
Force to boost touchscreen sample rate
This will enable maximum touch sample rate for all applications, which increases power consumption.
Remove multi-touch restriction for edge areas of touchscreen
This will increase possibility of accidental touch.
Use SDR-to-HDR technology to widen the colour gamut for a superb visual experience
Use MEMC-based video frame interpolation technology to make animation more fluid
Feature is unavailable on current display resolution

• Above features will increase power consumption when watching videos, and will be disabled when Battery Saver is on.\n• To make above features work properly, display will fallback to 60hz for some video apps, even if you set them to higher refresh rate.
Feature is unavailable on Battery Saver mode
Limit charging to extend battery life
Charge your device after placing it on a supported wireless charger
Run wireless charger at a low power level to minimise noise
Use your device as a wireless charger to charge supported devices
Place the other Qi-enabled wireless charging device (e.g. wireless earbuds) under your phone and align it in the center
Wireless reverse charging has been suspended
Device is in power save mode
Device power level is lower than stop level
Allow running Android debugging as root
Select what icons to show in status bar
Require unlocking to access some sensitive QS tiles
Select preferred 5G mode for each sim card
Configure the audio output based on media content
Show network speed in the status bar
Battery history stats are going to be reset!
Show options for recovery, bootloader & SystemUI in power menu
Short click Power Button to end on-going call
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
Configure various gestures to take screenshot
Short click Volume Down and Power to take partial screenshot
Hold with three fingers on screen for 1s to take partial screenshot
Swipe down with three fingers on screen to take full screenshot
Turn the screen on when charger gets plugged / unplugged
Double-tap on the lockscreen to sleep device
Double-tap on the status bar to sleep device
Adjust brightness by holding and sliding across the status bar
Disable gestures on status bar when device is in landscape mode
Long press power button to toggle torch when screen off
Configure auto-rotate individually for each apps
Display an animation along the edges of the screen when pulsing
Show edge light whenever ambient display is shown instead of just for notifications
Customize your statusbar clock and date
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Hide and show clock at regular intervals of time
Always on will be turned off when device is unplugged
Show heads up only for dialer & messaging apps
Show heads up only for dialer & messaging apps in landscape mode
Disable selected apps from showing heads up
Show heads up only for dialer & messaging apps when using selected apps
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Automatically pauses media when the volume is muted and will resume automatically when volume is restored within the set time.
When the screen is off, long-pressing volume keys will skip music tracks
Don\'t play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Raise keyboard by reserving blank space below keyboard
Remove navigation bar height while keeping the gesture pill
Swap the \"Back\" and \"Recents\" buttons on the navigation bar
Use pure black background for dark theme
Permit hotspot clients to use this device\u2019s VPN connections for upstream connectivity
Unlock automatically if you input a correct PIN. This is slightly less secure than tapping Enter to confirm.
Scramble PIN layout when unlocking device
Add per-app volume rows into volume panel
Remove screenshot / screenrecord limits for all applications
Show an animated arrow for back gesture
To trigger long swipe action, drag back gesture for longer width to reach threshold. Release your finger when you feel haptic feedback or see a double arrow.
Configure brightness slider in QS panel
Show in QS & Quick QS Panel
Show auto brightness button next to the brightness slider
Show brightness slider in the bottom of QS panel
Configure tiles layout in QS panel
Show only icon for QS tiles
Enable vertical layout for QS tiles
Configure touchscreen gestures when screen is off
When screen is dark, single tap to show ambient display

This setting is different from the default home app setting. You will be able to switch selected launcher as default launcher & recent provider without root needed.\nReboot is needed for the change to take effect.
This change requires reboot to take effect. Do you want to reboot now?
Configure shake sensors permission for each apps
Configure fullscreen display for each apps
Enable fullscreen display for selected apps
Switch fullscreen display will cause app to reload. Continue to switch?
Full resolution uses more of your battery. SystemUI will be restarted to reload proper layout.
Get more immersive experience in games
Manage apps that need to enable game mode
Prevent fullscreen events like incoming call from appearing
Don\'t play sound and vibration for notifications
Use danmaku style notifications for less disturbed game experience
Require double swipe to unlock gestures in fullscreen games
To enable status bar, swipe from screen left/right side
Press on color below to apply
Run app in a floating mini window to do more quick actions
Open any apps with Pop-Up View by swiping from bottom corner of the screen to middle
Customize apps to be shown in menu
Add more quarter circles in gesture menu
Digital assistant gesture will be disabled with Global Gesture enabled.
App will keep muted when switched from Pinned-Window mode to Mini-Window mode
App will unmute when switched from Pinned-Window mode to Mini-Window mode
Use Pop-Up View to jump to notification apps in portrait mode
Use Pop-Up View to jump to notification apps in landscape mode
Disallow selected apps from opening notification in Pop-Up View
Show 4g instead of LTE for signal icon
Display the exclamation mark on signal icon when data is disabled
